meanings.definition: A highway designed for high-speed traffic, typically with few or no intersections.
meanings.sent1: The new expressway reduced my travel time significantly.
meanings.sent2: We took the expressway to avoid traffic on the local roads.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd see a turtle trying to cross the expressway!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an expressway, always moving at top speed.
meanings.sent5: The expressway stretched out before us like a ribbon of asphalt.

meanings.definition: A road or highway for fast travel, especially one where vehicles can travel at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The expressway was clear of any obstacles, allowing for smooth driving.
meanings.sent2: Drivers should always obey the speed limit on the expressway.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe they built an expressway through the middle of the forest!
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed like cars on an expressway, unstoppable and direct.
meanings.sent5: The expressway hummed with the sound of engines as cars zoomed by.
